__TOC__

Unity Greeter is the greeter (login screen) that is used in Ubuntu.

== Acceptance Criteria ==

# Branch must compile
# Greeter runs inside a window with unity-greeter --test-mode and animates correctly
** Shows menubar with indicators and hostname
** Shows Ubuntu logo
** Shows user background with dot grid
** Shows user list
** Shows password entry
** Shows gear session menu
# Able to log in with user has a password
# Able to log in with user that has no password
# Able to log into guest session
# Able to switch users
